title: Kenneth Cole Men's Hudson Collection at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: These handsome and sophisticated storage solutions keep all your essentials handy and organized. A perfect gift for graduation, Father's Day, birthdays, promotions, and more. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/kenneth-cole-reaction-home-electronic-organizer/1041570357?Keyword=kenneth+cole+reaction
These handsome and sophisticated storage solutions keep all your essentials handy and organized. A perfect gift for graduation, Father's Day, birthdays, promotions, and more. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The men's Hudson collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home offers an assortment of unique storage pieces that will make it easy to stay organized while keeping important objects successful. This handsome collection was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The lidded valet box is sleeking compact when closed, but has ample room for accessories. It has multiple compartments and elastic bands to keep currency, cards, and receipts in place. The shoeshine kit contains everything you need to polish your shoes. It includes two sponges, a horse hair wooden brush, two shoeshine cloths and kiwi shoe polish in both black and brown. These all fit into a contemporary case perfect for travel. The gadget organizer elegantly stores most tablets, e-readers and phones as well as charging accessories. The lidded organizer has a magnetic closure and accessible ports for easy charging of your devices. The stacking trays feature three unique compartments for storage. They can be used individually or stacked together. The catch all helps keep you organized, it holds your loose items such as a wallet, coins, car keys, and sunglasses to name a few. The Hudson collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home is available exclusively online at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores. Make sure to view the other items available in the men's Hudson collection.
